short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks the 'Continue generating' button on ChatGPT when it stops.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto-Click ChatGPT 'Continue generating'

This extension automates the process of clicking the "Continue generating" button on ChatGPT when the response generation stops. It's designed to provide a seamless experience by ensuring uninterrupted content generation without the need for manual intervention.

Key Features:
Automatic Button Click: Detects when ChatGPT stops generating a response and automatically clicks the "Continue generating" button.
Hands-Free Experience: Ensures that ChatGPT continues generating content without interruptions, even when the token limit is reached.
Easy to Use: Start or stop the auto-click functionality at any time using the extension's simple interface.
Lightweight: The extension runs in the background and only interacts with the specific ChatGPT interface.
Perfect for users who rely on long-form responses and want to avoid repeatedly clicking the button when generation pauses.

Instructions:
Install the extension.
Open ChatGPT in your browser.
Click "Start Auto-Click" in the extension popup to enable the feature.
ChatGPT will automatically continue generating responses when paused.
